website_summaries.verdict: Durable, heat-resistant gloves that will fit most users in your household and hold up well to extended use.
pros: Made of durable silicone with a cotton interior
Gives you a strong, nonslip grip
Thick yet flexible enough to allow for a normal range of motion
cons: These gloves have short cuffs that may not adequately protect your wrists

customer_reviews.title: You can wrestle LAVA with these bad boys!
customer_reviews.text: Have you ever wanted to touch lava? With these gloves you can wrestle Satan, thats how heat resistant they are. Hot plates, pots, pans, tops, trays, and magma, you will be protected. Fits manly men and tender ladies hands!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Nice heat resistance. Slightly larger than my hand. But work well.
customer_reviews.author: Light Lai

customer_reviews.title: The BEST solution to prevent kitchen burns
customer_reviews.text: we have had these for 2 years of daily use in our home kitchen. they are wonderful. they fit my son's xl size hands, while I, a woman with a smaller size hand dont find them clumsy to use. they are just as effective as the day I bought them. perfect for bakers and for use with cast iron pans and those hot, hot handles I wipe them clean with a damp towel when they get sauce on them. getting another pair for the camper.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Lake

customer_reviews.title: My hubs loves these!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has renewed his love for smoking meat. he was having issues trying to remove it from the smoker rack and I honestly grew tired of helping him. I found these and he LOVES them. He says his hands have not gotten hot yet! They can be hand washed but I also place them in the washer with my dishtowels when needed and let them air dry. Such a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jeeper for life!

customer_reviews.title: Good for in the kitchen or around the grill
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these gloves to use for canning season to handle hot jars and lids as well as the pressure cooker. I am well pleased with the gloves and I think they will work very nicely for canning season when it gets here. I didn't really think about it when I ordered the gloves but after they arrived I could see that they would be great to get hot roasters and casseroles out of the oven. They have a very good grip and so things are not likely to slip out of your hands. They have a cloth lining and slip on and off quickly and easily. I am well satisfied and would definitely order the same thing again.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves, better than plain silicone.
customer_reviews.text: These are great, I have several pairs. One for kitchen, one for grilling, one for brewing. I like the padding on the inside, a friend has just the plain silicon and your hands get sweaty pretty quick and the heat comes through faster too.
customer_reviews.author: M. Atwell

customer_reviews.title: Lava Gloves
customer_reviews.text: These things could pull a brisket out of mother earths core. Wife's curling iron left plugged in? use these bad boys. Live in Texas and need to buckle your seatbelt? wont feel a thing. Microwave anything on a non-microwavable plate? Check-mate. Not only do they resist hell's blaze, but they have an comfortable cotton lining to double as winter gloves to keep your hands nice and toasty. Or if there's a nice cold beer at the bottom of the ice bath cooler, your arm may freeze, but you'll be able to grip and rip that bottom dwelling glacial temperature bottled beer. Definitely a must.
customer_reviews.author: m. Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I'll return these. They do not fit a woman's hand, and because of the general proportions I don't think they would fit a man either. Another problem is the fabric lining. If, while washing the exterior of the gloves, the lining were to become wet it could never dry as the gloves are too bulky to be turned inside out.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Doe

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for protecting from burns! They are better than the old oven mitts because of the added dexterity of fingers. They also protect better from steam burns when dumping hot water. I can wear them when pulling things out of the oven without the risk of an "unprotected spot" which has typically been the way I have been burned. The only negative is the difficulty that I experience pushing my fingers into the gloves, but that will likely alleviate as they are worn.
customer_reviews.author: Serenity

customer_reviews.title: Hello Earthlings
customer_reviews.text: 1st: These gloves when wore make you feel like you have hands from another planet. They definitely don’t feel like any other glove I’ve worn. 2nd not a good idea to put in the dishwasher the insides stay soaking wet. Even when wearing these gloves and putting soap on them trying to wash is difficult. I do not recommend these glove to anyone. Look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: K. Broderick

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves them
customer_reviews.text: So far my husband has used a handful of times and has loved these gloves. He can now easily move things around on the grill, or use just one with another using a spatula to move items on the grill. They have been easy to clean with soap and water - I haven't gotten the inside glove part wet as of yet, just watch what I'm doing and wash the outer layers. Certainly would recommend for anyone that loves grilling!
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: Too slippery
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these :( They seemed super durable when I got them out of the package, but my husband almost dropped a super hot cast iron skillet last night when he tried using these to grab the skillet handle. So, we're returning them
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves if you have abnormally small hands
customer_reviews.text: Are these gloves made for people with exceptionally small hands? I certainly don’t have giant’s hands, and I know there’s people with much larger hands than mine, but these gloves won’t fit anyone with normal size hands. Sure I can wrestle my hand inside the glove but forget about me being able to pick anything up because there’s no room for the gloves to flex as I close my hand. I made better pot holders in my kindergarten class. Utter pot holder fail!
customer_reviews.author: Doctor T

customer_reviews.title: Fits an x-large hand
customer_reviews.text: My husband has large hands and these gloves actually fit him, well like a glove. Not tight, good fit. They work really well for smoking. Our local Rescue Squad, recently had a pig and turkey roast. I took the gloves to the roast and gave them to one of the guys that was handling the smoker and deep fryer. He was pleasantly surprised at how well the kept the heat away from his hands. He gave the gloves a run for the money. Liked them so well, I have got the put away for next year's roast and bought my husband another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta L.

customer_reviews.title: a bit large
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are huge and feel ridiculous. I put them on and my first thought was "These look huge and feel ridiculous. Who's Shrek sized hands did they shape these after? It's like I put on those huge foam hands that people take to sporting events." I quickly, however, dismissed my irrelevant observations as I pulled some juicy steaks from the oven without noticing the heat that I usually feel with my old fabric oven mitts. 5 stars for effectiveness, 1 star for ergonomics because I assumed these would fit well in order to also handle extremely hot erlenmeyer flasks. Still works fine and not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Funky color that matches nothing outside of Pee Wee's Playhouse, but... Super fuzzy comfy inside (unusual for cooking gloves/mittens) and really protects against heat. It protected so well I thought the pot was cold. Overall, win. I wish there were more colors, and a way to hang them up, but I'm very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DG100

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use.
customer_reviews.text: So I had a chance to use the gloves this past weekend. It was very hard to use and pick up what we were grilling. The fit is terrible. I tried reversing them and no better. Sorry, for me these gloves came up short and most likely will have to buy another pair to replace these. (Not. usable)
customer_reviews.author: Kmunshower

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY A GREAT FIT!
customer_reviews.text: Loves the fit! Finally found a glove I could put my hand if and it be comfortable. Very heat resistant and overall a great glove. Gave it 3 stars because the first time I used them they formed a hole somehow in the thumb. I’m not sure how. I don’t want to return because I like them. But when I clean them they get wet inside and now I can’t use in boiling water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thick and comfortable quality
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for the cast iron cookware on my gas stove! The liners inside are very comfortable and allow your hands to slip in and out quickly. I can hold on for a very long time before I feel too much heat. I bought a pair of another brand without liners, but they are not good for more than a few seconds of contact at a time. One little feature that I love about these are the sewn-in loops just on the inside of each glove. I keep them hanging right next to the stove.
customer_reviews.author: Julee Muro de Gerome

customer_reviews.title: perfect for several uses
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these gloves because my old oven mitts were not doing the job and I was tired of ending up with burns on my fingers and wrists. This gloves perform as advertised! No more burns, no more dropping sheet pans that were too hot to handle. The unexpected bonus of this product was its ability to make opening jar lids a breeze. Much more efficient than those thin rubberized discs I'd been using. I intend to order more of these gloves for Christmas stocking stuffers.
customer_reviews.author: blondey

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best gloves I've ever used! I work in a bakery. I was looking for something heat resistant enough to withstand handling oiled bread when it comes out of the 425 degree oven, without having to worry about the oil seeping through the gloves. This has exceeded my expectations! Theyre easy to clean, and hard to misplace due to the bright color! The seller even messaged me a few days after the order arrived to make sure I was happy with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Britanni Butler

customer_reviews.title: Stupendious Gloves for the cooking class
customer_reviews.text: Fit is about right- I have size L hands and have a bit of room left to go in these. I've used them for taking meat off the smoker, pans out of the oven, as a trivet, and to throw at my kids... not a failure so far. Pattern is little hearts, which my daughters love. Oh Cutie! they proclaim. These are dishwasher safe so if you need to wash them because you have smelly hands, go ahead and stick them in. I just use a bit of dish soap on the outside and rub the gloves together as if I was washing my hands.
customer_reviews.author: advanracing62

customer_reviews.title: heat resistance
customer_reviews.text: these gloves are perfect, I use them when I'm cooking large meat on my Traeger grill. I can reach in and grab whatever I'm cooking to flip it or remove it. After your done just go and wash your hands (gloves) and there good to go for the next time. I have stuck my hands in the Traeger when the temperature was 500 degrees and never felt the heat. I can honestly say there are no cons to these gloves. They work perfectly for what I bought them for. I would highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: garth davis

customer_reviews.title: A must for any pit masters out there!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I looked long and hard before deciding on these. They perform as promised and are great to have when grilling. They only downside for me is that they are huge and there is only one size! Wish there was a smaller size, but I love them nonetheless. Easy to clean and great for moving around HOT grates and stones and meat! It is a major plus that they are waterproof. Would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: PS408

customer_reviews.title: A must have!!
customer_reviews.text: A must have!! For real! My fiancé and I went camping and he used them more than I did....but we both were instantly impressed! They barely got dirty, and even when he picked a log up straight out of the middle of the fire (these gloves made him more of a daredevil, I swear) he didn’t feel even warmth through them. Great grips, great heat protection. Fun color. We love them and will probably get a couple more pairs! Seriously the best gloves I have found for cooking over fire! Get these gloves and you won’t be disappointed!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa B

customer_reviews.title: Bought in 2016 and going strong in 2020
customer_reviews.text: Bought these back in 2016. I absolutely love them. They've served my family and I great over the years and they're still going strong. Great heat resistance and they have no issues with keeping my clumsy self from spilling hot water on myself when baking cheesecake! They are a bit bulky in the drawer though but it's easy to forgive with how good they've been to me!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Glad to see these on Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: I was ecstatic to find these on Amazon. Gave them as a gift long ago and they disappeared in a move. We were glad to find them again. The best for serious bbq and smoker chefs. You can easily handle big slabs of meat, ribs, and turkeys. Then the best part. While wearing them add dish detergent and wash them while you wear them. Dry and done. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: KHS

customer_reviews.title: Safety,safety,safety
customer_reviews.text: I recently had a severe fall and must now use a walker. I live alone and take care of myself, including cooking my meals. These gloves are a life saver when I need to move ANYTHING hot. As you can imagine my stability has been compromised but if I use the gloves even a splash over of hot food isn't a problem. I can pick up an item In whatever way is safest not worrying If I will get burned or have the item slip from my grasp . I am very happy with this purchase and would recommend this product highly. Even the price Is great.
customer_reviews.author: priscilla lesieur

customer_reviews.title: seems well made; very small
customer_reviews.text: As a man with large hands, I was concerned they would not fit properly. Unfortunately I was right; the webbing for the fingers barely reached halfway to the webbing of my fingers. I also struggled to grasp test objects. The gloves were well made and would be handy to have, but I would be concerned that I would drop or mishandle food with them.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great to stay safe when grilling
customer_reviews.text: Time of ownership: 3 months I use these when filling up the grill with charcoal from the chimney and adjusting the air flow for the grill. Occasionally I also use them when handling the food. They are pretty large so you don't have a lot of fine motor control when you put these on but for keeping you safe from getting burnt when handling hot surfaces these are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Ram

customer_reviews.title: Everybody should have a pair. Just saying:)
customer_reviews.text: Love these ! Iactually tossed all my other kitchen gloves out and I only use these in my kitchen,I like them because I can pick up a Roast straight out of a pan put it on a cutting board & start cutting....LOL and then wash the outside of gloves in the sink . I got my first pair as a gift , these I Bought for my son for his first condo.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: dangerous hot spots
customer_reviews.text: There are dangerous hot spots in these gloves when handling extremely hot objects. I removed a 500o pan from the oven and almost had to drop it. This is not an optimal heat resistant glove! Possibly this would be useful for stovetop handling of lower temperature pans and utensils. Cleaning is relatively easy. Can't comment on its durability over time.
customer_reviews.author: wallatom

customer_reviews.title: Built for besting your BBQ
customer_reviews.text: I always hated getting beer can chicken and pork shoulders off the grill/smoker until these babies arrived. The bright color means they don't get lost with the other grilling supplies. The liner means no burnt hands. The textured silicon outside grips extremely well - no chicken slipping out of your hands. I have medium-to-large hands depending on the glove, and they fit very well. The only possible recommendation would be to make them slightly longer. One of my all-time favorite Amazon buys, so I bought another pair for my dad.
customer_reviews.author: J. Noel

customer_reviews.title: Gumby you forgot your gloves
customer_reviews.text: They work, but the inside is very tight for my medium hands, yet the outside is gumby like. Way too big and bulky. I suppose that it is required for the heat shielding but I would rather have gloves that fit the hand snug and were able to grasp handles easier. I have relegated mine to the drawer under the oven and will use them when changing hot racks, and for that they are excellent. Other use not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee Lover

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!
customer_reviews.text: I specifically bought these Gloves for dry canning. Taking hot jars out of the oven and immediately placing lids and tightening while still hot. I am beyond happy with this product - exceptional performance and worth the one time cost for many more canning projects. A plus is I didn't realized they were fabric lined on the inside which means no sweaty, wet hands. I would definitely recommend to anyone and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: L. Dumas

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy 3 sets if I had more hands!
customer_reviews.text: I bake and cook most the meals for my family. I also do canning. These gloves work so well I can take submerged canning jars out of the hot water bath with my gloved hands. It's like I am bare handed as far as ease of use. I'd buy more pairs if I could rationalize more uses.
customer_reviews.author: John Ludemann

customer_reviews.title: Delivers on its promise.
customer_reviews.text: Just bought our second pair. We took the first pair with us camping and used it so much while cooking on the campfire that we decided to leave it with our camping stuff. Then we needed a second pair for home because we couldn't be without them. Makes life so much easier to just reach out and grab things directly without having to worry about losing your grip on a hot pad.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Kesher

customer_reviews.title: Does it all
customer_reviews.text: I've owned and discarded mittens and potholders over the years and generally been dissatisfied with how quickly they became dirty and difficult to use they were. These Silicone cooking gloves score on all counts. My first test was to fire up my cast iron skillet to see if how it handled extreme heat. No problem ! Next test was dexterity, something which always bothered me with other protectors. Once again, perfect ! And cleaning was as simple as washing one's hands. I am 100% satisfied and highly recommend these gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Dp

customer_reviews.title: Good for grabbing pots, not for handling BBQ
customer_reviews.text: Bought these hoping I could use them to pull apart BBQ meat, but they are just way too slippery. The juice/sauce just makes everything slide around and they simply wont work for this. For handling hot items though, they work just fine. Size/fit is odd though. I bought the largest size for my large hands and while the fingers are oversized and loose fitting....the circumference of the hand portion is too small making them very tight.
customer_reviews.author: 762x51

customer_reviews.title: Works well although a little big
customer_reviews.text: These work well, but I wish they had more size options, and it would be nice if they came farther up your arm. They come up a decent way so you can reach into the oven, but longer would be better. Also, they're a bit big and clumsy for smaller hands, but I haven't found any easy-to wash oven mitts that insulate this well that aren't - so I think they're at the top of the list. When they get a little oil or ingredients on them, I just wash my hands with the gloves on in the sink and they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Marian Harris

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I use this with my air fryer when I need to reach in and pick up hot accessory racks or pots or pans. I can easily grab with my fingers instead of fumbling around with tongs. Excellent heat resistance. I can hold a rack or pan that has been in the fryer at 400° F. Makes it so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: JD3rdPig

customer_reviews.title: Short fingers
customer_reviews.text: I'm kind of amazed at the ratings, seem well made and I'm sure they would do their job but unfortunately they have very stubby little fingers on them. On my XL hands the fingers only come down to the 2nd knuckle, it's like they were made for beings from another planet. Sending them back if I can.
customer_reviews.author: R. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and easier to slip on and off with the cotton liner.
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of large silicone gloves that I could still feel the heat through. I bought these while in another State with my regular gloves at home. In fact, I was at my mother's taking care of her, and she had only cotton or those old knitted potholders that were useless. These are great for grabbing potatoes, or a cooked chicken for cutting. I bought a second pair for my wife, who was 3000 miles away, and now we have two pair.
customer_reviews.author: Rondo

customer_reviews.title: Flexible
customer_reviews.text: Got these for the smoker and they work great. Doesn’t get hot and you can grab anything and easily clean them. They get moist inside so be aware where you place them and make sure they can dry out. Easy to deal wth smoking meat with these without a major mess. They are very flexible, not stiff to grab things.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These were a replacement for the ones that I had in storage. Much to my dismay I guess there are rodents who enjoy the taste of silicone. The fingertips were chewed off of most of the gloves. I know am kind of glad as I had to replace them. These gloves are awesome. Love the color and in addition they are lined. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Mindi

customer_reviews.title: Great oven mitts
customer_reviews.text: We received this as a gift for Christmas. As soon as I used them, I bought these for other people I know who could use them. The gloves do protect from heat (unlike similar gloves). They are very flexible and super easy to clean. The color helps them to stand out in the drawer we use to store pot holders. Fabulous buy for you or a fellow cook.
customer_reviews.author: J. Guthrie

customer_reviews.title: Great product for smoking meat and to be able to clean the gloves.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product to grab your meat and rotated around on a smoker or in the oven or anything like that. To use it to grab a pan or anything else at 400° or more I would not hold onto it that long as you will see. I bought them to use on my smoker so I can rotate and season my meat. Great product for that!
customer_reviews.author: Redbone 73

customer_reviews.title: Great heat glove
customer_reviews.text: Great glove; I use this for grilling and the oven all the time. I have moved things as hot as 500 degrees without an issue but you do have to be quick. They are great to use to grip things which cannot be done with a mitt. Don’t get the inside wet if possible or let it dry completely with good air flow. I recommend- this is my second pair. Wish they came in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Gimshewicz

customer_reviews.title: Simple, effective product
customer_reviews.text: A convenient product that worked as described. I usually require XL rubber dishwashing gloves, and these fit my hands well. They are a little bit "clunky", but the nature of the product requires them to be so. I picked up a pork shoulder out of my smoker with ease. I also handled hot pans with no problem. Very hot items coming out of the oven may require a little extra insulation, but for general use these gloves are great.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Forrest

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are perfect. Fit a little big but you don’t really notice or mind. The inside is cozy and you never feel the heat. Love the color and the additional hanging strip. Seem super durable too. Quickly becoming our only “hot pad.”
customer_reviews.author: Rachel H.

customer_reviews.title: Ok - could use a non slip coating
customer_reviews.text: These work fine but my only complaint is the surface is more slippery than I’d like. Definitely need on both hands, which makes it clumsy, or need to use with a hot pad in the other hand. Still useful in dealing with hot foods or containers.
customer_reviews.author: alt

customer_reviews.title: My Second Pair of these Gloves
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of these cooking gloves. They are easier to use than the previous gloves, although I like the previous gloves I ordered a couple of years back. They block the heat better than the old time cloth versions. I am not sure they would work that easily to change a light bulb, but they are great in the kitchen and easy to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy C

customer_reviews.title: These work great!
customer_reviews.text: Our friends brought theirs over last time we had a BBQ, and we ordered them the next day! They are a great size, easy to get on and off, and a lot easier to grip than our old Ove Glove ever was. They also don't take up too much space, and it says you can put them in the dishwasher, although I've just hand washed at this point. Highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: J. Stout

customer_reviews.title: Work well bit not flexible
customer_reviews.text: Works but stuff. Makes it a bit difficult to maneuver my clean up tools. I got these to clean my new outdoor griddle. They also get very hot on the outside under the flame but not on the inside. So they are protective. Just not very flexible.
customer_reviews.author: James C. Guy

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: While the gloves do exactly what they are supposed to. I wished they came in different sizes. It is quite large for someone with smaller hands. I am happy with the heat resistance and you can even throw them in the dishwasher to clean them.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Johnson

customer_reviews.title: These worked as expected
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of canning and need to have a way to easily take out hot jars from my stock pot. I didn't want to invest in a canning rack and tongs, so I tried this method. I am able to reach into boiling water and lift out jars. NOTE: After 3 times on one glove, it starts to get too warm, but I can switch off. I have completely replaced my cloth oven mitts. I put these in the dishwasher, and they came out perfectly clean.
customer_reviews.author: Holli Helenschmidt

customer_reviews.title: They work well
customer_reviews.text: I tried them and I’m very happy, just a smidge too small but they won’t slide off easily, not a fan of the cotton or similar material that comprises the lining, I would prefer a synthetic material, however, overall I’m satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: larry

customer_reviews.title: Durable and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Although the one-size-fits-all gloves feel a little small for my hands, I've had (so far) no issues with them slipping off when holding something hot. FYI: I would be nice if they rode up the hand more, a little higher past the wrist. This would offer more protection when using them with food on the back end of the grill or oven.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Szymoniak

customer_reviews.title: Small hand beware!
customer_reviews.text: So far these work for what I need them. I needed some quick wash gloves that I could use to flip and handle a turkey. That is a success. However, as you can see in the picture these are HUGE!!! I am on the smaller side and expected these to be large but these are no better for me than ones without fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Kim K

customer_reviews.title: Excellent protection
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used these gloves yet for picking up large items such as a roast, but I use them frequently for picking up steamed dishes and they're great for that. Previously, I used cloth oven mitts and when they got wet, OUCH! These gloves solved that problem. The textured surface was also an advantage over the cloth mitts as it made it easier to grip. My mother-in-law from China was staying with us and she loved using them so she's taking a pair back with her.
customer_reviews.author: Stringfellow Hawke

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and goes on and off easily!
customer_reviews.text: I love these gloves from the little heart shapes on the gloves to the warm thank you note inside. I really wanted gloves that didn't stick to my hands when taking them off...these don't stick since there is a cloth interior. Nice job!
customer_reviews.author: itsme

customer_reviews.title: Great oven mitts!
customer_reviews.text: I got these to replace my many-years-old oven mitts that were not longer even working. These are such a step up, and I love that you can just wipe them clean when they get food spilled on them rather than having to launder them (though I think you can do that, too?). They work great, and both my husband and I can wear them size-wise (I am very petite and he is a giant). Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Janon

customer_reviews.title: great for woring with hot food
customer_reviews.text: Great heat resistance. Work great for working with hot foods while grilling. The outside the gloves are easy to clean. The gloves are somewhat cumbersome..and have very little grip with slippery/ wet raw meat. I use the gloves for grilling, smoking and frying. Overall I am happy with these gloves and recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: JDG

customer_reviews.title: Cheap glove that will prevent burns.
customer_reviews.text: The gloves work well and prevent burning your hands. The durability is less than great as they already have two small tears/holes in them. I noticed the holes when washing (had my hands in the gloves) and they got wet inside.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Berger

customer_reviews.title: Good Gripping Ability!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves work so much better than mitts. You can easily grab plates and cooking utensils. I bought them mainly for BBQ grill use, but find them very useful in the kitchen also. They are also easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: D. Graf

customer_reviews.title: Best Deal Ever
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of cooking and burns seem to go along with that territory. These gloves are big enough for husband also, but the cloth lining holds them secure for my smaller hands. They repel heat and that is what truly matters. They're a little bulky, but the benefit outweighs the size issue. I can hold anything hot and not feel it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheilah Rice

customer_reviews.title: Does what they say they will do - Check sizing though
customer_reviews.text: A little on the large side so keep that in mind when ordering but work great for what they say they will do. Only 4 stars from me because they don't fit my wife's hands that well (so they end up being more clumsy than they would on larger hands) and that lowers their usage in our household but they are still great to have around the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great idea and product.
customer_reviews.text: Love these, what a great idea. Just put em on and grab anything right out of the oven, so surprising. Read the reviews and wish they were a little longer in the fingers, but that’s just nit picking. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: JonCryCat

customer_reviews.title: Not Made For Human Hands
customer_reviews.text: The product was not made for normal human sized hands. I don't have large hands, I don't have small hands, I typically wear a medium or large glove. This products fingers were short by probably a half inch, and the padding on the inside squeezed my fingers. Then I had my wife try it on, and she has small hands, and even she said the fingers didn't fit her. I am not sure who their target audience is, but it is not humans.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Love these gloves!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Great protection from hot foods, I can use my fingers! The pair I replaced were useless when it came to trying to use the fingers. Soooo easy to clean, just put them on and stick your hands in the soapy water and wash them! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Agee 13

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product. Will never use fabric ones again
customer_reviews.text: I have always HATED fabric cooking gloves. they are always dirty or if you accidentally get your finger in liquid wearing them when taking food out you burn yourself. Not a problem with there! If you get anything on them just a quick rinse and good to go! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Spencer S.Top Contributor: Fishing

customer_reviews.title: very happy with these
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace some silicone oven mitts that I found really hard to use. These are 100% better, enabling me to handle stuff coming out of the oven much better. They aren't the best fit for me, but still usable.
customer_reviews.author: daver

customer_reviews.title: Made for tiny hands
customer_reviews.text: This is more of a mitten than a glove. They fit over my hands ok, but the fingers are way, way too short to allow them to bend beyond the second knuckle. I have larger than average hands for a man, but not exceptionally so (I usually buy “large” work gloves, not XL) and I can barely grasp things between thumb and fingers. Might be fine for many women, but men keep looking. Otherwise quality is quite good.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Hazzard

customer_reviews.title: Got Stubby Fingers?
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product but my fingers are almost too long for these as others have said. Otherwise appear to be very well made so I would expect the manufacturer to modify slightly to fit more hands.
customer_reviews.author: Doug B

customer_reviews.title: How did I ever do without these
customer_reviews.text: For anyone cooking large hunks of meat on a smoker or grill, whatever tool you have to transfer meat is just not quite "right". These gloves WORK. Grab without poking or tearing the meat, and without burning your hands. Two un-burned thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Scout706

customer_reviews.title: Great for grilling!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my fiancé because he LOVES to grill. It could be well below freezing outside, and he would still want to grill anything he could. I wanted to get him something that can withstand the heat of the grill, yet be comfortable and easy to work in. He’s uses these gloves all the time, and he loves them! Such an awesome gift!
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: great protection
customer_reviews.text: I have dropped a few hot trays because they slip on the silicone. A little STIFF to be able to get a good grip on smaller items or thin edges. Heat protection is awesome. The lining makes them very comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Does the work a little too thin for Grilling
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable glove and does the work for most of the cooking, a little too thin for grilling if you try to grab the burning hot steak from grill then your hand might taste the steak before your month.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lu

customer_reviews.title: Keep your hands safe and unsweaty
customer_reviews.text: Very heat resistant, don't make your hands really sweaty, comfortable enough to wear for longer periods of time. I use them for brewing beer when transferring hot liquid and cleaning equipment with hot water.
customer_reviews.author: AlexBello

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, a bit on the small size.
customer_reviews.text: These are really great. I have medium size hands and I'll admit they are a little tight, but not bad. My wife is a 98 lb. Asian Girl and they fit her perfectly. I pulled a 400 degree pyrex dish out of the oven and held it in the gloves for over a minute and although it was a bit hot, it was nowhere near burning my hands.
customer_reviews.author: J. Baggs

customer_reviews.title: They will protect your hands from the extreme heat of a grill
customer_reviews.text: I have fairly large hands and have a lot of trouble fitting in any gloves. I just fit in these and my wife can use them too, a little large for her, but they really do protect on the grill and in the oven.
customer_reviews.author: JudgeFla

customer_reviews.title: Great for any grill master!
customer_reviews.text: These silicone cooking gloves are perfect for any backyard barbecue expert! Everything from grabbing your actual grill grate to an aluminum foil-wrapped corn on the cob will be much easier with these on rather than using tongs or any other tool. They do feel a bit "clunky," so don't try to pick up a dime or a needle or something tiny, but are indeed perfect for grabbing anything you might need to that is too hot to do any other way. Great product, great seller!
customer_reviews.author: Reese Golchin

customer_reviews.title: Like them
customer_reviews.text: Someone posted a review in my name and I do not agree with what was said. I use these gloves everytime I smoke meat. I will repurchase when I need new ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Safe alternative to pot holders
customer_reviews.text: I got these for handling hot loaves of bread or cast iron pans in the oven. (They're too bulky for handling muffin tins.) I wear a 6-1/2 glove (size small Nitrile) but these silicone are comfortable for me. I like that I can swish them in hot soapy water if they get dirty.
customer_reviews.author: J. Yee

customer_reviews.title: The gloves are great for gripping things and stay on my hands
customer_reviews.text: These gloves changed my life!!! I feel so much more confident grabbing hot pots and pans from the oven. On Thanksgiving I wore them and picked the hot turkey up and turned it in the pan without any heat penetrating the gloves. The gloves are great for gripping things and stay on my hands. They are so easy to wash. Friends and family who saw me use them on Thanksgiving were so impressed with them that I gave them as Christmas gifts. This is one of my favorite items in the kitchen! I can’t recommend them highly enough. Super product.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy M.

customer_reviews.title: This is great prodcut
customer_reviews.text: It has been a long time since I have bought something this good........well worth the money. It is great for my roasted tomatoes that I do for my hot sauce. Again did a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Willie06

customer_reviews.title: whos' hands do these fit?
customer_reviews.text: A single star because they are heat resistant but there is way way too much play in the palms of these silicone gloves when you are grasping items. These appear to be made for aliens - I can't think of a single human hand that these would work for.
customer_reviews.author: d argo

customer_reviews.title: LOVE tyhese oven gloves!!
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a glove that is easy to wear, and, protects your hands from heat. No more oven gloves made out of cloth that get so dirty and crusty! LOL! These are the bomb and I will to give to my family of cooks!!
customer_reviews.author: ChristineCCadaret

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves for bar-b-q/oven Protection.
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are great! They are exactly as described. Initially I thought they would be “bulky”, but I find them very comfortable and protective. I’m very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shemom

customer_reviews.title: Not a great fit!
customer_reviews.text: I am a male with medium-sized hands. These gloves absolutely are way too small for me. I bought these for barbecuing and roasting corn. Totally useless, because of the size to use to shuck the hot corn ears. They do work well as heat pads on which to place hot pans.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno J

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I own a pair of silicone mitts but they are slippery and not very flexible. These gloves are wonderful! Very flexible fingers and easy to grip pans. Extremely heat resistant. They were an excellent purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: janet

customer_reviews.title: The heat resistance and they're my favorite color.
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that I can safely pick up very hot baked potatoes from the microwave and I don't need to run with them or bowels of food etc to get them to the table. I had a little bit of a problem to get them on.the lining in the gloves needed to be stretched to get them on my hands. thank you very much ☺ Katie
customer_reviews.author: K.Fort

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are great! They slip on and off very easily and quickly, clean up is a breeze. Great grip, completely keeps the heat away! Highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Mark in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Not very useful
customer_reviews.text: This thing might as well be a mitten shape, the fingers can hardly move, the sizing is weird. It's like it's made for short thick fingers only, but even then given the ergonomics, it would be difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent BBQ and Smoker gloves
customer_reviews.text: Amazing gloves. I'm able to pick up hot coals and rearrange them, hold a coal basket full of hot coals, and move grates as if they were room temp. When they get hot, a quick shot of water from a garden hose brings them right back down. These clean up great in the dishwasher, though they are so well insulated that the interior fingers stay damp indefinitely, unless you prop them up in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: marmar57

customer_reviews.title: They work great on anything I have pulled out of the oven
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of the reviews figured I'd give it a shot. even though I saw a lot of reviews of people burning their hands. I have no clue what type of molten products they were using them on. They work great on anything I have pulled out of the oven.
customer_reviews.author: G. Gates

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I've ever given a 5 star review, but these are great! I don't have to panic while hurrying to take things out of the oven. They protect my hands for as long as has been necessary so far.
customer_reviews.author: RichardL

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves.
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves. Bought them on a lightning deal and wasn’t sure what to expect. Was pleasantly surprised. I have big hands and they still fit good. Worked great for oven cooking and will try them on the grill also. Would recommend as they are a good price also.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service good product
customer_reviews.text: The size on Amazon was a bit small but they sent me a free replacement pair so customer service A++ the larger pair does fit better but still a bit uncomfortable to grasp small items but they really do work great for heat resistance in the silicone is super easy to clean so I am happy with them
customer_reviews.author: Joshua V.

customer_reviews.title: Very useful!
customer_reviews.text: I just love these! So easy to use. Much better than an oven mitt, much more hand mobility. Very easy to wash. I have been using these for several months and i have had no issues. I would definitely purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: britt

product_meta.title: AYL Silicone Cooking Gloves - Heat Resistant Oven Mitt for Grilling, BBQ, Kitchen - Safe Handling of Pots and Pans - Cooking & Baking Non-Slip Potholders - Internal Protective Cotton Layer
feature_bullets: ENHANCED HEAT PROTECTION: We've carefully designed our dual-layer gloves to maximize your heat protection from open flames and oven temperatures with an outer silicone glove and inner heat-resistant cotton layer.

MULTIPURPOSE VERSATILITY: The most versatile kitchen tool for baking, cooking and grilling, they can be used inside the kitchen for baked goods, by the grill for barbecue chicken, frying a turkey, or even the fireplace!
SUPERIOR NON-SLIP GRIP: Each of our silicone 5-finger gloves comes with textured gripping surfaces to reduce the risk of accidents. Never again worry about slipping plates, hot pans or steamy ovens.

ADVANCED HEAT RESISTANCE: Crafted with enhanced food-grade safe silicone that handles even the hottest temperatures and lined with cotton-soft insulation, you can protect your fingers and hands all the way past your wrists.
WORRY FREE GUARANTEE: We work hard to create the safest and best silicone cooking gloves on the market, which is why we're confident in offering a worry free guarantee for satisfaction.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,369 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
